## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description       | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `noClick`  | `no-click` | no clicks allowed | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `selected` | `selected` | is selected       | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | value             | `string`  | `undefined` |

| Event                | Description           | Type                  |
| -------------------- | --------------------- | --------------------- |
